item.title: 政府遏制军事起义，玻利维亚债券反弹
item.description: 在士兵冲进总统府数小时后，军队夺权企图失败，玻利维亚美元债券周四反弹。【原文：Bolivia’s dollar bonds rebounded Thursday after an attempt by the army to seize power failed within hours of soldiers storming the presidential palace.】

item.title: 世界第二大可卡因原料生产国可卡因产量下降
item.description: 秘鲁当局周三表示，世界第二大可卡因生产国用于制造可卡因的原料种植面积多年来首次下降。【原文：The area planted with the raw ingredient used to make cocaine in the world’s No. 2 producer fell for the first time in years, Peruvian authorities said Wednesday.】

item.title: 高盛大举招聘，预示私募股权投资时代终结
item.description: 私募股权投资行业长期轻松获利的时代已经一去不复返，高盛集团正在为未来更艰巨的工作深挖洞、广积粮。【原文：A long era of easy profits in private equity is gone, and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is digging in deeper for the harder work ahead.】

item.title: 随着美国石油流入，北海石油的看涨阶段似乎即将过去
item.description: 由于美国供应的大量涌入，世界上最重要的石油价格突然出现的令人吃惊的上扬可能会有所缓解。【原文：A sudden and surprising upturn in the world’s most important oil price may be set to ease off thanks to an influx of supply from the US.】

item.title: 英伟达股价剧烈波动让人工智能反弹成为焦点
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）股价的大幅波动再次引发了关于这家芯片制造商涨势是否持久的争论。虽然该股的估值和竞争威胁是主要关注点，但有一个变量是关键：需求的持久性。【原文：Big swings in Nvidia Corp. shares have reignited debate about the staying power of the chipmaker’s rally. While the stock’s valuation and threat of competition are major concerns, one variable is key: durability of demand.】

item.title: 加拿大发现经由加州中转站运输石油更便宜
item.description: 加拿大最新的石油管道加快了该国向亚洲出口重质原油的速度，而途经加利福尼亚州的一条改道管道则延长了原油的运输时间，但有可能降低运输成本。【原文：Canada’s newest oil pipeline has turbo-charged exports of the country’s heavy crude to Asia and a diversion through California is making for a longer but potentially cheaper journey.】

item.title: 美国液化天然气的长远未来取决于大选
item.description:
拜登提出的暂停新建天然气终端的建议是白宫竞选中的一个争议焦点。【原文：

Biden’s moratorium on new gas terminals is a bone of contention in the race for the White House.

】

item.title: 巴西称美航欺诈案目标已逃逸
item.description: 巴西联邦警察开展了迄今为止最大规模的行动，在里约热内卢签发逮捕令和搜查令，以惩治零售商 Americanas SA 大型欺诈案的责任人。【原文：Brazilian Federal Police carried out its most extensive operation yet to punish those responsible for a massive fraud carried out at retailer Americanas SA with arrest and search warrants issued in Rio de Janeiro.】

item.title: 变化无常，难以预测"：快钱交易员为何喜欢特朗普
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）自以为是的风格可能会让金融市场再次动荡不安，而这对那些以此为乐的全球快钱交易员来说恰恰是好事。【原文：Donald Trump’s from-the-hip style may start making financial markets volatile again — and that’s just fine for a breed of global fast-money traders who thrive on that.】

item.title: 华尔街最热门交易之一：词源学研究
item.description:
对 "合成风险转移 "的非正式探讨，一次一个词。【原文：

An informal exploration of ‘synthetic risk transfers,’ one word at a time.

】

item.title: 不列颠哥伦比亚省 1,680 亿美元基金大幅增持股票，同时加大信贷押注
item.description: 不列颠哥伦比亚省公共养老金管理公司的高管们表示，在交易长期疲软的情况下，他们正在创造性地分配资金；在包括私人信贷和基础设施债务在内的资产类别上下注。【原文：Executives at British Columbia’s public pension manager say they’re getting creative in allocating money — making bets on asset classes including private credit and infrastructure debt — during a prolonged soft patch for dealmaking.】

item.title: 诺和诺德将限制韦格威在中国上市，以避免全球混乱
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）将限制其肥胖症治疗药物伟哥维（Wegovy）在中国的初期销售，因为该制药商正在努力解决如何控制世界上最大肥胖人群获得这种药物的问题。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S will restrict initial sales of its blockbuster obesity treatment Wegovy in China, as the drugmaker grapples with how to control access to the medicine for the world’s biggest population of obese people.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美国数据公布前股市下滑，美光公司在令人失望的收益后暴跌，低迷的日元仍是市场关注的焦点。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Stocks slip before run of US data, Micron tumbles after disappointing earnings and the lowly yen remains in focus. Here’s what’s moving markets. — David Goodman】

item.title: 捷克汽车制造商预计今年产量将创历史新高
item.description: 据捷克汽车工业协会（Automotive Industry Association）称，捷克今年的汽车产量预计将超过大流行前的峰值。【原文：Czech car production is expected to exceed its pre-pandemic output peak this year, according to the Automotive Industry Association.】

item.title: 天气良好，可可将迎来两年来最长跌势
item.description: 可可在纽约市场出现两年来最长的连续亏损，因为市场焦点转向有利的天气，这可能有助于西非重要种植者的作物生长。【原文：Cocoa headed for the longest run of losses in two years in New York as focus turns to favorable weather that could aid crops in crucial West African growers.】

item.title: Blackstone 聘用前瑞士信贷亚太区首席执行官 Helman Sitohang
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士称，随着全球最大的另类资产管理公司在亚太地区的扩张，Blackstone Inc.【原文：Blackstone Inc. has hired Credit Suisse’s former chief executive officer for Asia Pacific, Helman Sitohang, as the world’s biggest alternative asset manager expands in the region, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 中国前国防部长因腐败问题被开除党籍
item.description: 据中国国家电视台报道，中国已开除前国防部长李尚福的党籍。【原文：China has expelled former defense minister Li Shangfu from the Communist Party, according to state television.】

item.title: 需求激增，瑞银调整私人资产基金销售方式
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）正试图将该行所有的私人市场产品集中到一个部门，以巩固其在全球有限合伙人中排名前五的地位。【原文：UBS Group AG is seeking to cement its position as top-five player among global limited partners, by pooling all of the bank’s private-markets offerings into one unit.】

item.title: CLO 是被动型经理人寻求欧洲增长的新目标
item.description: 最近，大量现金涌入追踪美国抵押贷款债务的 ETF，促使基金经理们试图在欧洲复制这种模式。【原文：A recent deluge of cash into ETFs tracking US collateralized loan obligations is spurring money managers to try to replicate the model in Europe.】

item.title: 银行家称 2024 年损益表 "本应很棒"，却只是 "不错 "而已
item.description: 年初的一系列巨额交易未能转化为并购的持续复苏，此前的势头因各国央行的畏缩和地缘政治的不安而受阻。【原文：A flurry of megadeals early in the year failed to translate into a sustained recovery in mergers and acquisitions, after the momentum was stymied by skittish central banks and geopolitical unease.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金 "激进 "抛售科技股
item.description: 根据高盛集团的分析，在英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）短暂成为全球最大公司的一个月里，对冲基金 "积极 "抛售科技股。【原文：In a month when Nvidia Corp. briefly became the world’s largest company, hedge funds were “aggressively” selling tech stocks, according to analysis from Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 印度信贷将受益于指数相关债券流动
item.description: 在印度 2 万亿美元的固定收益市场上，为数不多的女性公司经营者之一表示，随着印度加入全球债券指数，流入印度的资金将逐渐流入公司债券。【原文：The capital flowing into India as it joins global bond indexes will gradually trickle into company notes, according to one of the few women to run a firm in the country’s $2 trillion fixed-income market.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行行长豪瑟称经常账户盈余可能不会持续
item.description: 澳大利亚储备银行二号人物安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）说，澳大利亚连续五年的经常账户盈余可能不会持续下去，即使持续下去，澳大利亚经济仍需要大量外国投资。【原文：Australia’s five-year streak of current account surpluses may not persist, Reserve Bank No. 2 Andrew Hauser said, and even if they do, the economy will still need a lot of foreign investment.】

item.title: 据说日本财务省准备进行人事变动
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本财务省预计将在未来几天内宣布一系列预定的人事变动。【原文：Japan’s Ministry of Finance is expected to announce a series of scheduled personnel changes in coming days, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 埃及耗资 100 亿美元的风电场将于 2026 年破土动工
item.description: 一家相关公司表示，世界上最大的风力发电场之一将于 2026 年 3 月在埃及开工建设，因为炎热夏季的严重断电凸显了这个北非国家的能源需求。【原文：Construction of one of the world’s biggest wind farms in Egypt will begin by March 2026, a company involved said, as grueling power cuts during a broiling summer highlight the North African nation’s energy needs.】

item.title: 高盛亚洲资深投资人黄宗智加入硅谷风险投资公司
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Stephen Wong, a veteran Goldman Sachs Group Inc. investment banker, will join technology venture capital firm Valley Capital Partners, marking a rare move to the buy-side by one of the US banking giant’s senior Asia bankers.】

item.title: 波音获准恢复向中国交付宽体喷气机
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在中国航空安全监管部门完成对一个关键驾驶舱部件的技术审查后，波音公司已获准恢复向中国的航空公司交付宽体喷气式飞机。【原文：Boeing Co. has been cleared to resume delivering wide-body jets to carriers in China after the nation’s air safety regulator completed its technical review of a key cockpit component, according to people briefed on the matter.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔称欧洲央行今年可能只会再降息一次
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员彼得-卡齐米尔说，借贷成本有可能在 2024 年再下调一次。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Peter Kazimir said one more reduction in borrowing costs is likely in 2024.】

item.title: 日本最大机场之一成田机场面临航空燃油短缺问题
item.description: 日本国内机场一直受到喷气机燃油短缺的影响，现在这一影响已扩大到日本最大的机场之一。【原文：A jet fuel shortage in Japan that’s been impacting the nation’s domestic airports has now expanded to one of its largest aerodromes.】

item.title: 日本激进基金罕见地赢得大同董事会席位
item.description: 一家日本基金取得了重大胜利，获得了服装公司大同（Daidoh Ltd.）的董事会职位，这表明激进投资者在该国的影响力日益增强。【原文：A Japanese fund scored a major victory in securing board positions at clothing firm Daidoh Ltd., in a show of growing influence of activist investors in the country.】
